mapper.select: SELECT p.id as headTeacherId, p.name as headTeacherName FROM profile p LEFT JOIN teacher t ON p.id = t.profile_id LEFT JOIN teacher_class_map tcm on t.profile_id = tcm.teacher_Id LEFT JOIN class c ON tcm.class_Id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{classId} and t.school_id = #{schoolId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (name, class_id, sex, birth, ring_number, ring_phone, creation_date, last_update_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{classId}, #{female}, #{birth}, #{ringNumber}, #{ringPhone}, #{creationDate}, #{lastUpdateDate})
